message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a method for robust data association in SLAM systems using a learned local feature descriptor for 3D LiDAR scans. This involves the use of a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) for learning the descriptor and a Siamese network for matching the descriptors. The paper also presents a method for estimating local surface patches and obtaining ground-truth correspondences. Given these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is Robotics (cs.RO), followed by Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Computation and Language (cs.CL).
